trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o evento de <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag" /> .

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> event occurs during a drag-and-drop operation and allows the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> evento ocorrer durante uma operação de arrastar e soltar e permite que a fonte determinar se a operação de arrastar e soltar deve ser cancelada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs> specifies whether and how the drag-and-drop operation should proceed, whether any modifier keys are pressed, and whether the user has pressed the ESC key.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs> Especifica se e como a operação de arrastar e soltar deve continuar, se quaisquer teclas modificadoras são pressionadas e se o usuário pressionou a tecla ESC.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> event sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Cancel?displayProperty=nameWithType> if the ESC key was pressed and sets `Action` to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Drop?displayProperty=nameWithType> if the left, middle, or right mouse button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> conjuntos de eventos <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Cancel?displayProperty=nameWithType> se a tecla ESC foi pressionada e define `Action` para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Drop?displayProperty=nameWithType> se o botão esquerdo, central ou direito do mouse é pressionado.

trans-unit.source: For information about the event model, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre o modelo de evento, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: This code excerpt demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs> class with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> event.
trans-unit.target: Esse trecho de código demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs> classe com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> evento.

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A> method for the complete code example.
trans-unit.target: Consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A> método para o exemplo de código completo.

trans-unit.source: The current state of the SHIFT, CTRL, and ALT keys.
trans-unit.target: O estado atual das teclas SHIFT, CTRL e ALT.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the ESC key was pressed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se tiver sido pressionada a tecla ESC; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction" /> value.
trans-unit.target: Um valor <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the status of a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o status de uma operação do tipo "arrastar e soltar".

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction" /> value.
trans-unit.target: Um valor <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction" />.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> event sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Cancel?displayProperty=nameWithType> if the ESC key was pressed and sets `Action` to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Drop?displayProperty=nameWithType> if the left, middle, or right mouse button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> conjuntos de eventos <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Cancel?displayProperty=nameWithType> se a tecla ESC foi pressionada e define `Action` para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Drop?displayProperty=nameWithType> se o botão esquerdo, central ou direito do mouse é pressionado.

trans-unit.source: This code excerpt demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs> class with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> event.
trans-unit.target: Esse trecho de código demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs> classe com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> evento.

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A> method for the complete code example.
trans-unit.target: Consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A> método para o exemplo de código completo.

trans-unit.source: Gets whether the user pressed the ESC key.
trans-unit.target: Obtém se o usuário pressionou a tecla ESC.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the ESC key was pressed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se tiver sido pressionada a tecla ESC; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> event sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Cancel?displayProperty=nameWithType> if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.EscapePressed%2A> is true.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> conjuntos de eventos <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Cancel?displayProperty=nameWithType> se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.EscapePressed%2A> for true.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.EscapePressed%2A> .
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.EscapePressed%2A> .

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo, um manipulador de eventos relatórios sobre a ocorrência da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: Este relatório ajuda você a saber quando o evento ocorre e pode ajudá-lo na depuração.

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: Para gerar relatórios sobre vários eventos ou eventos que ocorrem com frequência, considere substituir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> com <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou anexar a mensagem como um multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o código de exemplo, cole-o em um projeto que contém uma instância de um tipo que herda de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, como um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>.

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, nomear a instância `Control1` e certifique-se de que o manipulador de eventos está associado com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current state of the SHIFT, CTRL, and ALT keys.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estado atual das teclas SHIFT, CTRL e ALT.

trans-unit.source: The current state of the SHIFT, CTRL, and ALT keys.
trans-unit.target: O estado atual das teclas SHIFT, CTRL e ALT.

trans-unit.source: The bits that are set in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.KeyState%2A> property identify the keys or mouse buttons that were pressed during the operation.
trans-unit.target: Os bits definidos no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.KeyState%2A> propriedade identificar as chaves ou os botões de mouse foram pressionado durante a operação.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the left mouse button is pressed, the first bit in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.KeyState%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se o botão esquerdo do mouse é pressionado, o primeiro bit no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.KeyState%2A> está definida.

trans-unit.source: You can use the bitwise `AND` operator to test for a given key state.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o bit a bit `AND` operador para testar um determinado estado de chave.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the bits that are set for a specified event.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir lista os bits definidos para um evento especificado.

trans-unit.source: Bit
trans-unit.target: Bit

trans-unit.source: Key
trans-unit.target: Chave

trans-unit.source: The left mouse button.
trans-unit.target: O botão esquerdo do mouse.

trans-unit.source: The right mouse button.
trans-unit.target: O botão direito do mouse.

trans-unit.source: The SHIFT key.
trans-unit.target: A tecla SHIFT.

trans-unit.source: The CTL key.
trans-unit.target: A chave da lista de certificados confiáveis.

trans-unit.source: The middle mouse button.
trans-unit.target: O botão do meio do mouse.

trans-unit.source: The ALT key.
trans-unit.target: A tecla ALT.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> event sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Drop?displayProperty=nameWithType> if <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.KeyState%2A> indicates that the left, middle, or right mouse button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag> conjuntos de eventos <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.Action%2A> para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DragAction.Drop?displayProperty=nameWithType> se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs.KeyState%2A> indica que o botão esquerdo, central ou direito do mouse é pressionado.

trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse membro.

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: Para gerar relatórios sobre vários eventos ou eventos que ocorrem com frequência, considere substituir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> com <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou anexar a mensagem como um multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, nomear a instância `Control1` e certifique-se de que o manipulador de eventos está associado com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.QueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento.
